00054 GrMeshInst::GrMeshInst( UReader& reader, URef< GrMesh > mesh )
00055 : _mesh( 0 )
00056 , _skinInst( 0 )
00057 , _deformedMeshes( 0 )
00058 , _materials( 0 )

00136 GrMeshInst*
00137 GrMeshInst::Clone( bool deep )
00138 {
00140         GrMeshInst* newMeshInst = 0;
00141 
00143         if ( _mesh->GetSkin() != 0 || deep )
00144                 newMeshInst = new GrMeshInst( _mesh->Clone(), _materials, _transform );
00145         else
00146                 newMeshInst = new GrMeshInst( _mesh, _materials, _transform );
00147 
00149         return newMeshInst;
00150 }

00154 GrMeshInst::Cache()
00155 {
00156         _mesh->Cache();
00157         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < GetRangeCount(); ++i )
00158         {
00159                 if ( _deformedMeshes[ i ] != 0 )
00160                         _deformedMeshes[ i ]->Cache();
00161         }

00178 GrMeshInst::SetMesh( GrMesh *mesh, const URef< GrMaterial >* materials )
00179 {
00181         B_ASSERT( false );
00182

00207 //----------------------------------------------------------
00208 void
00209 GrMeshInst::SetMaterial( unsigned int range, URef< GrMaterial > material )
00210 {
00211         B_ASSERT( range < GetRangeCount() && material != 0 );
00212         _materials[ range ] = material;
00213         if ( material->HasDeformers() )
00214                 _deformedMeshes[ range ] = _mesh->CloneRange( range );
00215         else
00216                 _deformedMeshes[ range ] = 0;
00217 
00218         UpdateRangeGenTextures( range );
00219 }

00221 //----------------------------------------------------------
00222 void
00223 GrMeshInst::SetTransform( const MMat4x4& transform )
00224 {
00225         _transform = transform;
00226         bool valid = _transform.Inverse( _invTransform );
00227         B_ASSERT( valid );
00228         valid = _transform.GetRotate().InverseTransposed( _rotInvTranspose );
00229         B_ASSERT( valid );
00230 
00232         UpdateBounds();
00233 }

00280         plane.TransformFast( _transform, _rotInvTranspose );
00281 
00283         _transform.TransformCoord( pointOnPlane );

00316 //----------------------------------------------------------
00317 void
00318 GrMeshInst::Save( UWriter& writer ) const
00319 {
00320         writer.WriteInt( 'IHSM' );
00321 
00323         writer.WriteString( _mesh->GetName() );
00324 
00326         unsigned int rangeCount = GetRangeCount();
00327         writer.WriteInt( ( int )rangeCount );
00328 
00330         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < rangeCount; ++i )
00331         {
00333                 SaveMaterial( writer, i );
00334         }
00335 
00337         _transform.Save( writer );
00338 }

00340 //----------------------------------------------------------
00341 void
00342 GrMeshInst::Load( UReader& reader, const UFastArray< URef< GrMesh > >& meshArray )
00343 {
00345         delete[] _materials;
00346 //      delete[] _reflections;
00347         delete[] _deformedMeshes;
00348         delete _skinInst;
00349         _skinInst = 0;
00350 
00351         unsigned long tag = reader.ReadInt();
00352         B_ASSERT( tag == 'IHSM' );
00353 
00354         unsigned int meshListSize = meshArray.GetElemCount();
00355 
00358         tstring name = reader.ReadString();
00359         unsigned int i = 0;
00360         for ( ; i < meshListSize; ++i )
00361         {
00362                 if ( meshArray[ i ]->GetName() == name )
00363                 {
00364                         _mesh = meshArray[ i ];
00365                         break;
00366                 }
00367         }
00368 
00370         B_ASSERT( i != meshListSize );
00371         if ( _mesh->GetSkin() != 0 )
00372                 _skinInst = new GrSkinInst( this );
00373 
00375         unsigned int rangeCount = ( unsigned int )reader.ReadInt();
00376         _deformedMeshes = new URef< GrMesh >[ rangeCount ];
00377 
00379         CHECK_GL();
00380         _materials = new URef< GrMaterial >[ rangeCount ];
00381         for ( unsigned int mat = 0; mat < rangeCount; ++mat )
00382         {
00384                 LoadMaterial( reader, mat );
00385         }
00386         CHECK_GL();
00387 
00389         _rangeBounds = new SBoundsInfo[ rangeCount ];
00390 
00392 //      _reflections = new URef< GrTextureBase >[ rangeCount ];
00393 
00395         _transform.Load( reader );
00396 
00398         UpdateBounds();
00399         UpdateGenTextures();
00400 }

00402 //----------------------------------------------------------
00403 void
00404 GrMeshInst::Update( unsigned int frameTime )
00405 {
00407         if ( frameTime > _lastRenderTime )
00408         {
00409                 _lastRenderTime = frameTime;
00410 
00412                 if ( _skinInst )
00413                 {
00414                         _skinInst->ApplySkin();
00415                         UpdateBounds();
00416                 }
00417 
00419                 unsigned int rangeCount = GetRangeCount();
00420                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < rangeCount; ++i )
00421                 {
00422                         GrMesh* srcMesh = _mesh;
00423                         unsigned int srcRange = i;
00424                         const GrMaterial::DeformerArray& deformers = _materials[ i ]->GetDeformers();
00425                         for ( unsigned int deformerIdx = 0; deformerIdx < deformers.GetElemCount(); ++deformerIdx )
00426                         {
00427                                 deformers[ deformerIdx ]->Deform( _deformedMeshes[ i ], srcMesh, srcRange, frameTime );
00428                                 srcMesh = _deformedMeshes[ i ];
00429                                 srcRange = 0;
00430                         }
00431                 }
00432         }
00433 }

00435 //----------------------------------------------------------
00436 bool
00437 GrMeshInst::Pick( float& dist, const MRay& ray ) const
00438 {
00440         GrMesh::STriCollision triHit;
00441         if ( !Pick( triHit, ray ) )
00442                 return false;
00443 
00445         dist = ray.GetStart().Dist( triHit.hitLoc );
00446 
00448         return true;
00449 }
00450 
00451 //----------------------------------------------------------
00452 bool
00453 GrMeshInst::Pick( GrMesh::STriCollision& triHit, const MRay& ray ) const
00454 {
00457         if ( !ray.Intersect( _bounds.orientedBox ) )
00458                 return false;
00459 
00461         MRay localRay = ray.Transform( _invTransform, _rotInvTranspose.Transposed() );
00462 
00464         GrMesh::TriHitArray triHits;
00465         _mesh->Pick( triHits, localRay );
00466 
00468         if ( triHits.GetElemCount() == 0 )
00469                 return false;
00470 
00472         float minDistSqr = FLT_MAX;
00473         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < triHits.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00474         {
00476                 GrMesh::STriCollision& curTriHit = triHits[ i ];
00477                 float curDistSqr = ray.GetStart().DistSqr( curTriHit.hitLoc );
00478 
00480                 if ( curDistSqr < minDistSqr )
00481                 {
00482                         minDistSqr = curDistSqr;
00483                         triHit = curTriHit;
00484                 }
00485         }
00486 
00488         _transform.TransformCoordFast( triHit.hitLoc );
00489         _rotInvTranspose.RotatePointFast( triHit.hitNormal );
00490 
00492         return true;
00493 }

00495 //----------------------------------------------------------
00496 void
00497 GrMeshInst::RenderRange( unsigned int range, unsigned int vertexComponents, unsigned int frameTime )
00498 {
00500         B_ASSERT( range < GetRangeCount() );
00501 
00503         Update( frameTime );
00504 
00506         if ( _deformedMeshes[ range ] )
00507         {
00509                 _deformedMeshes[ range ]->BeginRender( vertexComponents );
00510                 _deformedMeshes[ range ]->Render( 0, false );
00511         }
00512         else
00513         {
00515                 _mesh->BeginRender( vertexComponents );
00516                 _mesh->Render( range, false );
00517         }
00518 }

00520 //----------------------------------------------------------
00521 unsigned int
00522 GrMeshInst::BatchRange( GrStreamingIB& streamingIB, unsigned int range, unsigned int frameTime )
00523 {
00525         B_ASSERT( range < GetRangeCount() );
00526 
00528         Update( frameTime );
00529 
00531         const GrMesh::SRange& curRange = _mesh->GetRange( range );
00532         streamingIB.AddIndices( ( _mesh->GetIndexData()->GetIndices() + curRange.start ), curRange.count );
00533 
00535         return curRange.count;
00536 }

00549         writer.WriteString( "" );

00553 //----------------------------------------------------------
00554 void
00555 GrMeshInst::LoadMaterial( UReader& reader, unsigned int range )
00556 {
00559         reader.ReadString();
00560 
00562         tstring name = reader.ReadString();
00563 
00565         tstring errors;
00566         URef< GrMaterial > material = gGrMaterialMgr->GetMaterial( name, errors );
00567         if ( material == 0 )
00568         {
00569                 B_ERROR( "Unable to load material \'" + name + "\'!\nReason: " + errors );
00570         }
00571 
00573         SetMaterial( range, material );
00574 }

00576 //----------------------------------------------------------
00577 void
00578 GrMeshInst::UpdateBounds()
00579 {
00581         const MSphere& sphere = _mesh->GetBoundingSphere();
00582         MVec3 pos = sphere.GetCenter();
00583 
00585         MVec3 scales;
00586         _transform.GetScaleSqr( scales );
00587 
00589         float maxScale = Sqrt( scales.Max() );
00590 
00592         _transform.TransformCoordFast( pos );
00593 
00595         _bounds.sphere.SetCenter( pos );
00596         _bounds.sphere.SetRadius( maxScale * sphere.GetRadius() );
00597 
00599         _bounds.orientedBox = MOBox( _transform, _mesh->GetAABox() );
00600 
00602         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _mesh->GetRangeCount(); ++i )
00603         {
00604                 float sphereRadius = _mesh->GetRangeBoundingSphere( i ).GetRadius();
00605                 MVec3 sphereCenter = _mesh->GetRangeBoundingSphere( i ).GetCenter();
00606                 _transform.TransformCoordFast( sphereCenter );
00607 
00608                 _rangeBounds[ i ].sphere.SetCenter( sphereCenter );
00609                 _rangeBounds[ i ].sphere.SetRadius( maxScale * sphereRadius );
00610                 _rangeBounds[ i ].orientedBox = MOBox( _transform, _mesh->GetRangeAABox( i ) );
00611         }
00612 }

00614 //----------------------------------------------------------
00615 void
00616 GrMeshInst::UpdateRangeGenTextures( unsigned int range )
00617 {
00619         GrMaterial* curMaterial = _materials[ range ];
00620         GrTextureStage::GenTextureFlag genTextureFlags = curMaterial->GetGenTextureFlags();
00621 
00623         if ( ( genTextureFlags & GrTextureStage::kGenReflection ) != 0 )
00624                 gGrTexGen->AddReflection( this, range );
00625 }

00627 //----------------------------------------------------------
00628 void
00629 GrMeshInst::UpdateGenTextures()
00630 {
00632         unsigned int rangeCount = _mesh->GetRangeCount();
00633         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < rangeCount; ++i )
00634                 UpdateRangeGenTextures( i );
00635 }
